Text: I have The Minds Eye - Beyond The Minds Eye and Gate To The Minds Eye - but I dont know how to share them!!! Help!

avatar2012; If you have the DVD's, the absolutely easiest way is to have AutoGK make the DVD-rips. Go to http://www.autogk.me.uk/ to download and install AutoGK.
Then create a torrent with your torrent software, I prefer utorrent, http://www.utorrent.com
Then go to http://thepiratebay.org/upload and upload the torrent. If you need more detailed help, pm me and I'll help you out.
what no sound.. u have to be kidding me

I'm probably being completely thick here, but I need some help.  I have downloaded this but don't know how to install the codecs or view this in anyway. Could someone kindly guide me through step-by-step please (from the point that the download finshed)?  Thanks in advance.
Thanks! This reencode is much better quality than the one inside: "THE_MINDS_EYE_-THE_COMPLETE_COMPUTER_ANIMATION_ODYSSEY.ISO" by 'Dj_Roguewolf'.
darkspaceboy: There is audio in this video. You must install a AC3-decoder.
